returns._0: price The price of the correlated token in scaled decimal places

InvalidTokenAddress().notice: Thrown if the token address is invalid

PoolTokenSupplyIsZero().notice: Thrown if the pool token supply is zero

ZeroAddressNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied address is a zero address where it is not allowed

NATIVE_TOKEN_ADDR().notice: This is used as token address of BNB on BSC

getPrice(address).notice: Fetches the price of the correlated token

userdoc.notice: This oracle fetches the price of stkBNB asset
